about_section.title: The Best Care for Your Car Wherever You Are!
about_section.description: Bij Fast Clean Service krijgt uw auto de hoogste kwaliteit stoomreiniging en detailing, ‘op locatie’ of in ‘onze vestiging’. Dankzij geavanceerde technieken en hoogwaardige producten reinigen én beschermen we uw auto met zorg en precisie.

steps.title: Maak een afspraak
steps.description: Kies eenvoudig een datum en tijd.

steps.title: Wij doen de rest
steps.description: Je auto wordt perfect gereinigd en verzorgd.

services_section.title: ONZE EXTRA OPTIES
services_section.description: Wil je nét dat beetje extra? Breid je behandeling uit met aanvullende services voor een nóg beter resultaat. Kies uit interieur-, exterieur- of detailing-opties en stel je eigen ideale behandeling samen.

services.title: Interieur Add-ons
services.description: Laat je interieur weer fris aanvoelen. Kies bijvoorbeeld voor een dieptereiniging van de bekleding, een leerbehandeling, of een intensieve geurneutralisatie via ozon. Ook verwijdering van huisdierharen, schimmel, braaksel of het stoomreinigen van het plafond behoren tot de mogelijkheden. Zelfs kinderstoelen kunnen apart diep gereinigd worden.
bullets: ✔ Safe for fabric, leather and plastic
services.description2: 📅 Book now and give your car the fresh start it deserves.

services.title: Exterieur Add-ons
services.description: Geef je auto extra aandacht aan de buitenkant. Van cabriodak- en schuifdakreiniging tot het reinigen van de tankklep en motorkap. Ook het verwijderen van vliegroest, hars of mos uit naden behoort tot de opties. Kunststofdelen kunnen extra worden gepoetst, en dorpels en deurranden worden grondig meegenomen.

services.title: Detailing Add-ons
services.description: Maak je behandeling compleet met professionele detailing. Denk aan het polijsten van koplampen of chromen delen, een claybar behandeling voor gladde lak, of een beschermende lakverzegeling. Kies uit 1-, 2- of 3-staps polijsten voor het beste resultaat, of ga voor een duurzame glascoating die je auto langdurig beschermt.
bullets: ✔ Removes dullness and yellowing for brighter light
✔ Better visibility and a fresher look

customer_reviews_section.description: Bij Fast Clean Service hebben we al vele tevreden klanten geholpen. Laat een review achter en vertel ons hoe we u geholpen hebben!

anywhere_autocare_section.description: Elke auto vraagt om een aanpak op maat. Laat je voertuig behandelen waar en wanneer het jou uitkomt – bij ons op locatie of gewoon bij jou thuis.

services.description: Geen tijd om langs te komen? Geen probleem. Wij komen naar je toe – aan huis, op kantoor of op elke gewenste locatie.

other_vehicles_care_section.description: Elke voertuig verdient een aanpak op maat. Of het nu gaat om een auto, motor, camper of boot: wij zorgen voor professionele reiniging en langdurige bescherming – precies afgestemd op gebruik en omstandigheden.

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: We differentiate our cleaning at your convenience anytime and anywhere. Our steam cleaning technology ensures a deep clean, even through the toughest spots equipped with superior hot water. We provide efficient professional service for all types of vehicles.

quality_as_priority.title: Quality as Priority
quality_as_priority.description: We prioritize approach quality with fully equipped service buses and cutting-edge cleaning techniques to perfect every detail.

our_values.description: Every car deserves the best, and we deliver excellence for both business and private customers.

experts_in_detail.title: Experts in Detail
experts_in_detail.description: Our certified team uses advanced techniques in polishing, coating, and steam cleaning for flawless results.

our_successes.title: Our Successes
our_successes.description: As a certified leader in detailing, we provide professional treatments that extend vehicle life and restore its like-new appearance.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.subtitle: Always Available for You
contact.description: Do you have a question or would you like to make an appointment? Simply contact us! Fast Clean Service are ready to help you with professional steam cleaning and car detailing, both on location and at our branch.

working_hours.title: WORKING HOURS
working_hours.description: We work by appointment only! Do you want to come by for a treatment on location? Make an appointment in advance to ensure availability.

questions.question: Do I need to make an appointment to visit your location?
questions.answer: Yes, we work by appointment only. This prevents long waiting times and ensures that we have enough time for your vehicle. Easily make an appointment via our website.

questions.question: How can I make an appointment?
questions.answer: You can make an appointment via our online booking page, by telephone or via WhatsApp. We advise you to book in advance due to the crowds.

questions.question: Can you be reached via WhatsApp?
questions.answer: Yes, we can be reached via WhatsApp for questions, quotes and bookings. Click on the WhatsApp button on our website to contact us directly.

questions.question: What are your opening hours?
questions.answer: We are open 7 days a week from 08:00 – 17:30, but by appointment only. Contact us for availability.

questions.question: Can I bring my car to you without an appointment?
questions.answer: No, we work by appointment only. This prevents waiting times and ensures that we can offer the best service.

questions.question: Do you offer home service?
questions.answer: Yes. We are a mobile detailing service and come to your home, work or other desired location. The first 30 km from our location are free; after that we charge a small mileage fee.

questions.question: What is your drop-off location for mobile service?
questions.answer: Our drop-off location is Omweg 38, 1566 AZ Assendelft. From here we charge any additional mileage costs.

questions.question: Can I contact you for a business collaboration?
questions.answer: Certainly! We work with companies, fleets, leasing companies and garages. Send us an email or call us for a customized quote.

questions.question: How quickly can I expect a response to my request?
questions.answer: We usually respond to emails and WhatsApp messages within 24 hours. For urgent questions, it is best to call us.

questions.question: What if I want to change or cancel my appointment?
questions.answer: No problem! Let us know at least 24 hours in advance, then we will schedule a new time together.

fleetcare.title: FleetCare
fleetcare.subtitle: WagenPark Maintenance - Professional Maintenance for your Fleet
fleetcare.description: At Fast Clean Service we offer a complete and worry-free service with WagenPark Maintenance maintenance solutions for business fleets. We understand that your vehicles have a role as the calling card of your company, and that is why we ensure that every vehicle is always there looking representative. With our mobile service, we perform maintenance on location, which takes some time and saves costs, without having to interrupt your business operations.

services.title: Exterior maintenance
services.description: Thorough steam cleaning, washing, and protection of the paint.

services.title: Interior maintenance
services.description: Deep cleaning with steam, vacuuming, dashboard cleaning, and cleaning upholstery.

services.title: Protective Coatings
services.description: Long-lasting protection with high-quality waxes & coating treatments.

fleetcare.quality_focus: We focus on high quality using the latest techniques and environmentally friendly products. Your vehicles stay in top condition for longer, which ensures a sustainable and professional fleet.

definitions.title: Article 1: Definitions
content: Order: Any agreement between the Customer and Fast Clean Service, whereby Fast Clean Service cleans vehicles for a fee.
Customer: The natural person or legal entity that has a vehicle cleaned by Fast Clean Service.
Fast Clean Service: The contractor, registered with the Chamber of Commerce under number 70208085, located at Omweg 38, 1566 HP Assendelft.

articles.title: Article 2: Applicability
content: These general terms and conditions apply to all quotations, services and agreements between Fast Clean Service and the Customer, unless expressly agreed otherwise in writing.

articles.title: Article 3: Appointments & Cancellation
content: Appointments can be cancelled up to 24 hours before the start of the appointment. In that case, the customer will receive the full amount paid as store credit, to be used for a future booking.
In case of cancellation within 24 hours before the start or in case of a no‑show, the full costs of the booked cleaning will be charged.
Fast Clean Service reserves the right to reschedule appointments free of charge in case of bad weather conditions or force majeure.

articles.title: Article 4: Travel surcharge
content: The standard departure point for mobile services is Omweg 38, 1566 HP Assendelft. If a franchise location is closer, this will be used as the departure point.
No additional costs will be charged for distances up to 30 km.
For distances above 30 km, €0.60 per additional kilometre will be charged.
The distance is automatically calculated based on the customer address provided.

articles.title: Article 5: Payment & Invoice
content: Payment must always be made in advance via the website.
Invoices are automatically sent after payment has been completed. Accepted payment methods via Stripe: iDEAL, Visa, Mastercard, Apple Pay, Google Pay.
Accepted payment methods via Coinbase (crypto): Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Solana (SOL).

articles.title: Article 6: Liability
content: Fast Clean Service is not liable for existing damage or damage to sensitive vehicle parts.
No guarantee is given for complete removal of stains or scratches.
In the case of intensive treatments, such as polishing and deep cleaning, the execution is at the customer's risk.

articles.title: Article 7: Complaints
content: Complaints must be reported immediately after the work has been carried out.
Complaints reported later will only be processed if there are demonstrable shortcomings.

articles.title: Article 8: Right of withdrawal
content: The services of Fast Clean Service fall under customisation and are excluded from the statutory right of withdrawal as soon as the work has started or been carried out.

articles.title: Article 9: Access & Workspace
content: The customer must ensure sufficient workspace and accessibility of the vehicle, so that the work can be carried out safely and efficiently.

articles.title: Article 10: Use of Images
content: Fast Clean Service reserves the right to use images of work carried out for marketing purposes, unless the customer objects to this before the start of the service.

articles.title: Article 11: Applicable law
content: All legal relationships with Fast Clean Service are exclusively governed by Dutch law.
Any disputes will be submitted to the competent court in Amsterdam.

paragraphs: This Privacy Policy describes Fast Clean Service's policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your information when you use our Services. It explains your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
We use your personal information to provide and improve our Service. By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information as described in this policy.

articles.title: Interpretation and Definitions
content: Interpretation
Capitalized words have the meanings defined below. The following definitions have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in the singular or plural.
Definitions
"Account" means a unique account created for you to access our Service.
"Company" means Fast Clean Service, Omweg 38, 1566 HP Assendelft.
"Cookies" means small files placed on your device by a website.
"Country": Netherlands.
"Device": any device that can be used to access our service, such as a computer or smartphone.
"Personal Data": information relating to an identified or identifiable person.
"Service": the Fast Clean Service website, accessible via https://fast-clean-service.onrender.com/
"Service Provider": any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the company.
"Usage Data": data collected automatically when using the service.
"You": the person using the service or representing the company.

articles.title: Data Collection and Use
content: Types of Data Collected
Personal Data
While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including:
Email address
First and last name
Phone number
License plate number
Location data for travel cost calculation
Payment information (for processing via Stripe or Coinbase only – not stored by us)
Use of Your Data
We use your personal data for the following purposes:
To provide and administer our services
For customer support
To contact you regarding bookings
To process payments via Stripe or Coinbase
For marketing purposes, only if you have explicitly consented to this
To improve our services

articles.title: Cookies
content: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze our website performance, and display tailored content. You can choose to decline cookies through your browser settings.

articles.title: Sharing Your Data
content: We do not share your data with third parties, unless this is necessary for the performance of our service (such as with payment providers), or if required by law.

articles.title: Data Security
content: The security of your information is important to us. We use industry standard security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure.

articles.title: Your Rights
content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Please contact us at info@fastcleanservice.nl for any requests regarding your information.

articles.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We advise you to review this policy periodically. Changes are effective when they are posted on this page.

articles.title: Contact
content: Fast Clean Service
Omweg 38, 1566 HP Assendelft
Email: info@fastcleanservice.nl
